label: CropProtectionTreatment
comment: A method or substance, such as chemical fertilizers and crop protection products, applied to plant growth whilst managing and controlling diseases and pests.

datatypeProperties.comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a process has met required criteria.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
